Bio Highlights Experience Influencers

Hi, my name is

Michael Scott

Regional Manager at Dunder Mifflin Sabre. Founder and CEO of Michael Scott Paper Company and former branch manager of Dunder Mifflin Paper Company. When I grew up I wanted to get married and have 100 kids so I could then have 100 friends and none of them could say no to being my friends.

    College education:
  • I did not attend college as I lost all my tuition money in a pyramid scheme.
That's what she said!

Career Highlights

  • Only Regional Branch Manager to win 17 Dundies under every category to have ever existed.
  • Proud Producer, Director, and Editor of the Michael Scott Productions flagship movie 'Threat Level Midnight'.
  • Mastered bubble wrap utility to survive third-degree foot burns caused by George Foremann Grills.
  • Proud Co-organizer of 'Diversity Day' and Child Star on a kid's show named 'Fundle Bundle'.
  • Chief Composer of two music singles - 'Goodbye Toby' and 'Straigth Outta Scranton'.
Well, well, well, how the turntables.

Experience

Dunder Mifflin Sabre

Regional Manager 2009-2012

Broad decision-making authority on branch operations. I place those responsabilities secondary to my desire to be friends with my employees. On the other hand, I also overstep my authority by hosting events that Corporate disapproves. The Dundies is my best project.

    Key Contributions:
  • Brief bouts of surprising insight
  • Laid-back approach often results in lower than expected workplace productivity
  • Scapegoating employees to cover myself

Dunder Mifflin Company

Regional Manager 1994

In charge of Scranton branch of Dunder Mifflin. Loyal to the company, trying to help my employeed when they endure difficulties. I spend 80 percent of my time “distracting others,” 19 percent of my time “procrastinating,” and 1 percent of my time “critical thinking.” Still, we have the best sales records of the entire company.

    Key Contributions:
  • Joking around and treating professional colleagues as personal friends
  • Silly conversations used to secure major sales
  • Spread my famous quote "That's what she said" and use it in inappropriate circumstances.
I’m not superstitious but I am a little stitious.

Influencers

Prison Mike

He wears a purple bandana over his head, he is in prison for theft, robbery and kidnapping the president's son for ransom.
He taught me everything I need to know as being scared of Dementors.

Michael the Magic

The best magician in the world. He tried to escape from a straitjacket once but failed because he lost the key, rumour has it Jim Halpert hid it.
He knows numerous magic tricks. He attended magic camps.
